data.title: Used 9 Drawer Vidmar Cabinets
data.meta-title: Used 9 Drawer Vidmar Cabinets For Sale
data.meta-description: These 9 Drawer used vidmar cabinets are on sale now at American Surplus! Featuring 400 lb. capacity per drawer, they're an excellent storage choice
data.related: <1>Used 12-Drawer Stanley Vidmar Cabinet</1> <2>Used 13-Drawer Stanley Vidmar Cabinet</2>

ul.li: Dividers not included, available for $1.49 ea.
Excellent Solution for small item storage

div.style: background-color: #fff3cc; color: #cf940c; border: 1px solid #ffedb9; border-radius: 2px; text-align: justify;
div.p: We're currently restocking materials to build this product, Click here to get notified when this product is ready to ship!

Vidmar Drawer Cabinets are a storage-efficient solution allowing you to store more while using less space. These particular Vidmar cabinets are blue and grey in color. These cabinets can be combined or stacked on top of each other to provide custom storage solutions for your business. They feature an all-welded steel construction and are very durable. The full drawer extension provides complete access to items and the ball bearing suspension on the drawers allows for smooth opening and closing.

strong.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold; line-height: inherit; color: #ff0000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;

p.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used vidmar cabinets 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
